1FR.SG.summary: Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes frozen raw shrimp, processed shrimp, and other seafood products in Thailand and internationally. It provides raw, cooked, sushi, and value added shrimp products, as well as shrimp powder and peeled head shrimp products. The company offers its products under the Seafresh, Sea Angel, GO-GO, Thai Chia, Phoenix, C Angel, and Ultra brands. It is also involved in the import and distribution of seafood; producing and selling animals feed and nutrition; consulting and installation of computer systems; and shrimp farm business. In addition, the company invests in seafood processing companies and other related business. Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mueang Chumphon, Thailand.

1TF.SG.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, canned mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, coconut milk products, and dehydrated pineapple core and mango, as well as coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates 28 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 17 company branches and 11 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABICO-R.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABICO.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

APCO-R.BK.summary: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and distribution of health and natural beauty products in Thailand. Its products include dietary supplements, cosmetics, and personal care products that are developed from natural plant and botanical extracts. The company also provides slimming, anti-wrinkle and anti-spots, skin care, and fat reduction products, as well as products for balancing immunity. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Natural Cosmetics Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited in July 2005. Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lamphun, Thailand.

APURE-R.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. The company offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

APURE.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. ASIAN.BK.long_name: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited
ASIAN.BK.summary: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells processed frozen seafood products in Thailand, the United States, Japan, Italy, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Frozen and Canned Food Products, Feed Stuff, and Other Business. Its products include frozen shrimp, tuna, sillago, and frozen squid products. The company also produces ready-to-cook or ready-to-eat processed seafood products; ready-to-eat products packed in cans, pouches, or plastic cups, such as fried rice, pasta, and tuna in curry sauce; pet food products; and aquaculture feed pellets. In addition, it produces animal feed, fishmeal, and feedstuff; distributes frozen seafood; and provides cold storage services, as well as is involved in the marketing and management activities. The company offers its products under the ASIAN FEED, Monchou, A.S.S., Blue Chef, Asian Surat, SAKURA, TCC, KIKU, Hero, Victor, Allstar, Rambo, SuperHero, Ruay Puan, and Faster brand names. Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

BEAUTY.BK.summary: Beauty Community Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale and distribution of cosmetic and skincare products under the Beauty Buffet, Beauty Cottage, Beauty Market, and Made In Nature names in Thailand and internationally. It provides make up products, facial care products, body care products, hair care products, beauty drink and food supplement products, and beauty accessories. The company sells its products through retail and non-retail channels, as well as franchises; and online. It operates through 18 branches in Indonesia, 29 branches in India, 29 branches in Myanmar, 5 branches in Malaysia, 5 branches in Laos, 1 branch in Brunei, and 1 branch in Japan, as well as 34,484 points of sale in the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as Monopolitan Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beauty Community Public Company Limited in July 2012. Beauty Community Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BR-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Ranch Public Company Limited produces and supplies duck meat products in Thailand and internationally. It provides duck portions, including breast fillets, drumsticks, and wings; and by-products. The company also offers pre-cooked products for the fast preparation of meals by food service chains, such as roast duck and smoked duck meat; and ready-made consumer products for supermarkets and retail outlets, including roasted, crispy whole duck, aromatic duck with pancakes and hoisin sauce, and duck drumsticks in orange sauce and sweet chilli sauce under the Dalee, Duck-To, and Canature brands, as well as under various private labels. In addition, it provides animal feed; and operates duck farms, hatcheries, feed mills, and distribution center. Further, the company engages in the duck slaughtering and duck meat trading businesses. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

BRR-R.BK.summary: Buriram Sugar Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes sugar and molasses in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Sugar and Molasses Business, Trading Agriculture Products, Electricity and Steam Generation and Distribution, and Others segments. The company offers refined, brown, white, and raw sugar; molasses; bagasse; and filter cake. It is also involved in trading of agricultural products; generation and distribution of electricity using biomass source; and production of organic and organic chemical fertilizers using filter cakes, as well as provision of research and development services to improve the efficiency of sugarcane farming and nourishment. In addition, the company provides logistics services, which consists of transportation and shipping commodities by land and waterways, domestic and international as well as unloading cargos from dock under the customs procedure. Further, it is involved in the manufacture and distribution of packaging products, which are made from bagasse; and steam generation and distribution activities. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is headquartered in Khu Mueang, Thailand.

CBG-R.BK.summary: Carabao Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, distributes, and sells beverages in Thailand and internationally. Its products primarily include carbonated and non-carbonated energy drinks, drinking water, ready-to-drink coffee, instant powder 3-in-1 coffee, vitamin C drinks, and zinc-contained drinks under the Carabao Dang, Carabao, Carabao Sport, and Woody C+ Lock brands. The company also manufactures, distributes, and procures glass bottles and aluminum cans, as well as carton boxes, oriented polypropylene labels, and shrink films used as packaging material for energy drinks and other beverages. In addition, it distributes third party products, including food and non-food category products; and manages distribution channels that includes multi-tiered agent system, distribution centers, cash vans, and modern trade channel, as well as engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHOTI-R.BK.long_name: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited
CHOTI-R.BK.summary: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Teppitak Seafood Company Limited, manufactures and sells frozen seafood in Thailand, Asia, Europe, and America. The company offers various block, semi-IQF, IQF, and vacuum packed items comprising raw and cooked head-on, headless, and peeled shrimps; extended shrimps; cooked tail-on butterfly, breaded, and easy peeled shrimps; and slipper lobster tail and meat. It sells its products under the Sea King, Sea Champion, Eagle, Sea Queen, Sea Flower, and Blue Gulf brands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

CHPFF.long_name: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited
CHPFF.summary: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agro-industrial and integrated food businesses in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Livestock Business and Aquaculture Business. The company produces and sells swine, chicken, cattle, duck, shrimp, and fish feeds; and breeds and farms swine, broiler, layer, duck, shrimp, and fish. It is also involved in the animal feed raw materials distribution, investment and international trading, food products wholesale and retail, property investment, property lease-out, and shrimp hatchery and animal feedmill businesses. In addition, the company produces, sells, imports, and distributes processed meat and ready meals, and probiotics. Further, it offers economic and trade consulting, management and advisory, financial guarantee, biological waste management, information technology, food research and development, and financial services. Additionally, the company engages in the operation of food processing plants, quick service restaurants, and training centers; broiler chicken integration business; provision and development of Asian food products; and swine farm construction activities. It provides its products primarily under the CP and CP Fresh Mart brand name, as well as other retail brands. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries worldwide. Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CM-R.BK.long_name: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited
CM-R.BK.summary: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and exports frozen vegetables in Thailand and internationally. It offers soy beans, green beans, sweet corn, baby corn, and mixed vegetables. Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CM.BK.long_name: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited
CM.BK.summary: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and exports frozen vegetables in Thailand and internationally. It offers soy beans, green beans, sweet corn, baby corn, and mixed vegetables. Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPALL-R.BK.summary: CP ALL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates and franchises convenience stores under the 7-Eleven name to other retailers primarily in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Convenience Stores, Cash and Carry, and Other. The company is involved in the manufacture and sale of convenience and frozen foods, and bakery products; sale and maintenance of retail equipment; information technology, as well as marketing and advertising activities; provision of research and development services; and cash and carry and e-commerce business, as well as operates as a life and accident insurance broker. It also distributes commercial cards and tickets, catalog merchandises, and equipment for retailing and software development; and offers bill payment collection, information technology, logistics, smart purse cards, investment, educational institution, human resources development, and training and business seminar services, as well as healthcare and medical specialist's consultation services. As of December 31, 2019, CP ALL Public Company Limited operated 11,712 stores. The company was formerly known as C.P. Seven Eleven Public Company Limited and changed its name to CP ALL Public Company Limited in 2007. CP ALL Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPI-R.BK.long_name: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
CPI-R.BK.summary: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes palm oil products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: The Palm Oil Products; The Palm Seeds, Palm Sprouts, And Coconut Sprouts; and The Electricity. It also provides palm seeds and sprouts, palm seedling products, and crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil; refined bleached deodorized (RBD) palm oil, palm kernel oil, palm olein, and palm stearin; and palm fatty acid distillate, palm kernel fatty acid distillate, and kernel meal, as well as trades in vegetable oil. The company offers its palm oil products for use in food and non-food industry applications; and supplies cooking oils in PET bottles, tins, and pouches under the LEELA, ARO, and Lek Kitchen brands for household consumer market. In addition, it produces and distributes biodiesel, and electricity from biogas. Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tha Sae, Thailand.

DDD.BK.long_name: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited
DDD.BK.summary: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes skin care products and supplements in Thailand. It offers its skin care products under the NAMU LIFE brand name. The company, as an original equipment manufacturer, also manufactures and advices in various kinds of skin care products, including cosmetics, such as creams, serums, gels, sprays, mists, masks, etc. In addition, the company provides management, technical, financial, and enterprise services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DOD.BK.summary: DOD Biotech Public Company Limited engages in the food supplements and health drinks business in Thailand. The company provides skin care products, dietary supplements for body shape, and health food supplements. It also offers nutritional supplements under the brand name Daeto. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

EE-R.BK.summary: Eternal Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the cassava plantation activities in Thailand. The company is involved in the plantation of tapioca and other energy crops. It also rents real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Sea Horse Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eternal Energy Public Company Limited in October 2009. Eternal Energy Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1987 is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GFPT-R.BK.summary: GFPT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes frozen and cooked chicken products in Thailand and internationally. The company is involved in the chicken evisceration activities; producing and distributing processed chicken food and by-products; and operating a feed mill and parent chicken farm for egg production and distribution. It also operates a grandparent chicken farm for parent stock chicks production and distribution; a parent chicken farm and hatchery for chicks production and distribution; and a broiler farm. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HTC-R.BK.summary: Haad Thip Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soft drinks primarily in Southern Thailand. It offers sparkling products comprising Coke, Fanta, Sprite, as well as Coca-Cola Zero No sugar, Coke Light, Coca-Cola Zero sugar, Sprites Zero No sugar, and Fanta No Sugar; and non-carbonated products, such as Minute Maid Splash, Minute Maid Pulpy, Minute Maid Vita Kids, Namthip Drinking Water, and Bon Aqua Mineral Water. The company also manufactures and distributes plastic bottles and semi-finished plastic bottles, as well as provides plastic bottles blowing services; manufactures and distributes food; engages in restaurant business; develops real estate properties; and manufactures and distributes consumer goods. Haad Thip Public Company Limited is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

ICHI-R.BK.summary: Ichitan Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-drink tea beverage in Thailand. It offers green tea under the Ichitan Green Tea and Shizuoka Green Tea brands; herbal drink under the Yen Yen by Ichitan brand; green tea mixed nanta de coco products under the Ichitan Chew Chew brand; juice mixed jelly and juice non-carbonated beverage under the Bireley's brand; and energy drink under the T247 brand. The company was formerly known as Mai Tan Company Limited. Ichitan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also offers medical equipment and other consumer products. The company also exports its products. Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company also exports its products. Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KAMART-R.BK.summary: Karmarts Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the manufacturing, packaging, import, and distribution of cosmetics and consumer products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Manufacture and Distribution of Consumer Products; and Warehouse Rental and Warehouse Service. The company offers facial care and cleanser, body care and cleanser, makeup, beauty accessories, hair care, dietary supplement, scented, acne and sensitive skin care, and oral care products under the Cathy Doll, Baby Bright, Boya, Jejuvita, Reunrom, Crayon, Cathy Choo, and SKYNLAB brands. It distributes products through convenience stores; supermarkets/hypermarkets, and discount stores; and specialty stores, as well as through catalogs and online. The company operates 48 shops under the KARMART brand. It also exports its products to Singapore, Cambodia, Vietnam, Myanmar, China, Laos, Indonesia, the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, Taiwan, Iraq, the United States, Hong Kong, Russia, and India. The company was formerly known as Distar Electric Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Karmarts Public Company Limited in April 2011. Karmarts Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KASET-R.BK.summary: Thai Ha Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes agricultural products, processed agricultural products, and instant products in Thailand and internationally. Its products include rice, vermicelli noodles, instant vermicelli noodle and rice porridge, vegetable oil, and snacks, as well as bean vermicelli, green mung bean, and instant bean vermicelli. The company also distributes vegetable oil, sugar, coconut milk, and chili plate. It offers its products primarily under the KASET, SMART CHEF, IMPERIAL TASTE, FIRST LADY, Coco Riz, Coco Jas, And Coco Rice brands. In addition, it operates rice mill and rice processing plant, as well as exports rice. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KBS-R.BK.summary: Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Sugar Cane, Sugar and Molasses Trading, and Utilities. The Sugar Cane segment produces and distributes sugar cane, as well as provides related services to planters. The Sugar and Molasses Trading segment purchases and sells sugar, molasses, and by products; and offers refined, brown, and raw sugar. The Utilities segment generates and distributes electricity and steam using bagasse as fuel. The company also manufactures and distributes ethanol. Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KISS.BK.summary: Rojukiss International Public Company Limited distributes skincare products, cosmetics, and food supplements in Thailand, Hong Kong, Indonesia, and the Philippines. It also provides sales and marketing consulting services under the Sis2Sis brand. The company was formerly known as Aisance Company Limited and changed its name to Rojukiss International Public Company Limited in July 2020. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Huai Khwang, Thailand.

KK-R.BK.long_name: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited
KK-R.BK.summary: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of consumer products in Thailand. Its utensils products comprise household cleaning products, including detergents, fabric softeners, compressed petals, etc.; products for daily use, which include toothpaste, toothbrush, mouthwash, etc.; skin and hair products, such as shampoo, shower cream, soap, etc.; beauty products comprising powder, cream, skin care, cologne, etc.; and products for children and adults, such as brushes for milk, baby diapers, adult diapers, etc. The company's consumer products include beverage products, which include cocoa powder, coffee, non-dairy cream, etc.; flavored milk products, such as milk powder, sweetened condensed milk, UHT milk, etc.; beverage products, including drinking water, soft drinks, health drinks, etc.; condiments and dry food products, such as condiments, vegetable oil, rice, etc.; and snack products comprising chewing gum, candy, etc. It operates 26 stores under the K&K Superstore brand name. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Songkhla, Thailand.

KSL-R.BK.long_name: Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited
KSL-R.BK.summary: Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar and by products in Thailand. The company offers raw sugar, high polarization sugar, white sugar, liquid sugar, and refined sugar, as well as molasses, bagasse, and filter cakes. It also manufactures and distributes bio-fertilizers; produces and distributes electricity and ethanol; exports sugar; and provides terminal and warehousing facilities. In addition, the company engages in the agricultural business; and provision of transport, goods shipping, and consulting services. Further, it operates a resort that provides accommodation and facilities for holiday vacation; a training center for employees and other general customers; and a commercial rental property. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTIS-R.BK.long_name: Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited
KTIS-R.BK.summary: Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar in Thailand and internationally. It offers raw, white, and refined sugar; molasses products or sugar residues that are used as raw material in various products, such as food and ethanol; dry and wet pulp; bio-fertilizers; and ethanol products, including industrial and fuel alcohol. The company is also involved in the generation and sale of electricity through a biomass power plant with a capacity of 60 MW; trade and rental of properties; and rental of agricultural machinery for farmers. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and distribution of containers made from bagasse and organic fertilizers; and provision of asset management, and research and development services. The company was formerly known as Kaset Thai Industry Sugar Company Limited. Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Nakhon Sawan, Thailand.

LEE.BK.short_name: LEE FEED MILL PUBLIC COMPANY LI
LEE.BK.long_name: Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited
LEE.BK.summary: Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes animal feed primarily in Thailand. The company provides pet food, livestock feed, and aquatic feed products. It offers products in concentrated pellet and powder forms to livestock and aquaculture industries, as well as concentrated feed for swine, chickens, ducks, cattle, fish, frogs, and shrimps under the Lee, Win, Max, and Pro-grade brand names. The company is also involved in breeding broiler chicks; crop drying, silo grain storage, experimental farming, and crop farming, as well as rental farming businesses; and the distribution of raw materials for the animal feed manufacturers. It also sells its products in the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, and the Kingdom of Cambodia. Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LST-R.BK.summary: Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited operates a crushing mill and a palm oil refinery in Thailand. The company offers cooking oil, margarine, shortening, special fat, and bakery ingredients comprising cocoa powder; and coconut, soybean, sunflower seed, corn, camellia, olive, blended canola, sunflower, pure canola, and rice bran oil. It also provides fruits and vegetables packed in can, pouch, and glass containers; fruit juices and juice drinks; coffee and miscellaneous beverages; and sauces and seasonings. In addition, it is involved in the oil palm plantation activities; holding of concessions to use forest reserve land; and generation of electricity using biogases. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LVN.SG.summary: CP ALL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates and franchises convenience stores under the 7-Eleven name to other retailers primarily in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Convenience Stores, Cash and Carry, and Other. The company is involved in the manufacture and sale of convenience and frozen foods, and bakery products; sale and maintenance of retail equipment; information technology, as well as marketing and advertising activities; provision of research and development services; and cash and carry and e-commerce business, as well as operates as a life and accident insurance broker. It also distributes commercial cards and tickets, catalog merchandises, and equipment for retailing and software development; and offers bill payment collection, information technology, logistics, smart purse cards, investment, educational institution, human resources development, and training and business seminar services, as well as healthcare and medical specialist's consultation services. As of December 31, 2019, CP ALL Public Company Limited operated 11,712 stores. The company was formerly known as C.P. Seven Eleven Public Company Limited and changed its name to CP ALL Public Company Limited in 2007. CP ALL Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MALEE-R.BK.summary: Malee Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes canned agriculture products, fruit juices, and non-alcohol beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company offers UHT and pasteurized vegetable and fruit juices under the Malee, Malee Food Service, Malee Tropical, and Malee Coco brands; and UHT box drinking water, other beverages, and PET plastic bottles under the Malee and good water brands. It also provides UHT and pasteurized milk and milk tablets under the brand name Chockhai Farm, as well as corn milk under the Malee I-Corn brand name; and TurBusta Maxx branded canned coffee. In addition, the company offers canned seasonal fruits, including rambutan, rambutan stuffed with pineapple, lychees, longans, water chestnuts, sugar palm, mangoes, etc.; canned sweet corn; canned pineapple; and canned mixed fruits under the brand names Malee, First Choice, Farmer, and Malee Foods Service. Further, it provides research and development services for scientifically transformation agriculture solutions; and engages in the contract manufacturing business. The company was formerly known as Malee Sampran Public Company Limited and changed its name to Malee Group Public Company Limited in April 2016. Malee Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

MOONG-R.BK.long_name: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited
MOONG-R.BK.summary: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited distributes baby and infant products, and other products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Distribution of Baby and Infant Products; and Distribution of Other Products. The company offers nipple and bottle products, breastfeeding support products, baby wipes, oral cleaning products, healthcare and hygiene products, cleaning and skin care products, and products for washing and cleaning baby bottles, as well as feed line, supplement, and accessory line products under the under pigeon brand name; butterfly pea serums for eyebrow and hair, as well as snow lotus balms to relieve scalds, bruises, bruises, ants, or mosquito bites under the Ai + aoon brand name; and baby pad child pads under the Softex brand. It also provides personal care and household products, including Foggy and Smile V water sprayers; and cotton wiping and cleaning products, wet wipes, toothbrushes, toothpastes, and whipped foam bath products under the V Care brand name, as well as toothbrushes under the PROENTAL B brand. In addition, the company offers herbal drink ready to drink products under the BAO brand name; milk tablets under the Mike Me brand; salt lemon and mint candies under the Himalaya Salt brand; and diapers, wet wipes, and lining pads under the MUMU, Softex, and V Care brands. Further, it operates moong-shop.com, an online store for its products. The company was formerly known as Moong Pattana Marketing Company Limited and changed its name to Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited in August 2008. Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NRF-R.BK.long_name: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited
NRF-R.BK.summary: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes seasonings and instant food products in Thailand, the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company offers sauces, condiments, and curries under the Por Kwan brand; soups, pastes, sauces, and condiments under the Lee brand; ready to eat meals under the Thai Delight brand; and teas under the Dede brand. It also provides co-packing services and private label products. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

NVAP.F.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
NVAP.F.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, herring, and salmon for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab sold directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients for use in consumer goods, such as infant formula, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and clinical nutrition; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also manufactures and distributes canned tuna and seafood, pet food, frozen shrimps, animal feeds, frozen foods and aquatic animals, ingredients, canned sardines and mackerel, and smoked salmon. In addition, the company offers printing manufacturing, logistic, training and management, e-commerce, consultancy, technical, and property rental services. Further, it is involved in the packaging, tuna oil refinery, and shrimp breeding and hatchery businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

NVAV.F.long_name: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited
NVAV.F.summary: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agro-industrial and integrated food businesses in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Livestock Business and Aquaculture Business. The company produces and sells swine, chicken, cattle, duck, shrimp, and fish feeds; and breeds and farms swine, broiler, layer, duck, shrimp, and fish. It is also involved in the animal feed raw materials distribution, investment and international trading, food products wholesale and retail, property investment, property lease-out, and shrimp hatchery and animal feedmill businesses. In addition, the company produces, sells, imports, and distributes processed meat and ready meals, and probiotics. Further, it offers economic and trade consulting, management and advisory, financial guarantee, biological waste management, information technology, food research and development, and financial services. Additionally, the company engages in the operation of food processing plants, quick service restaurants, and training centers; broiler chicken integration business; provision and development of Asian food products; and swine farm construction activities. It provides its products primarily under the CP and CP Fresh Mart brand name, as well as other retail brands. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries worldwide. Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OCC-R.BK.summary: O.C.C. Public Company Limited distributes cosmetics, clothes, musical equipment, and beauty accessories primarily in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Cosmetics Distributing and Beauty Services, Clothes, and Others. The company also provides beauty services, as well as manufactures/distributes bakery and beverages. In addition, it distributes cosmetics for face and body; hair care products; and women's wear products, such as lingerie, night wears, underwear, sport wear, swim wear, and casual wear under the Covermark, Paul & Joe, KMA, GUNZE, Ritmuller, Sungrace, Shiseido Professional, BSC Hair Care, Guy Laroche, MAKEUP STUDIO, Limex, and G&G brands. Further, the company engages in the haircut service business under the Easy Cut brand. It distributes its products through department stores, beauty centers, beauty salons, and modern trades. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OCC.BK.summary: O.C.C. Public Company Limited distributes cosmetics, clothes, musical equipment, and beauty accessories primarily in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Cosmetics Distributing and Beauty Services, Clothes, and Others. The company also provides beauty services, as well as manufactures/distributes bakery and beverages. In addition, it distributes cosmetics for face and body; hair care products; and women's wear products, such as lingerie, night wears, underwear, sport wear, swim wear, and casual wear under the Covermark, Paul & Joe, KMA, GUNZE, Ritmuller, Sungrace, Shiseido Professional, BSC Hair Care, Guy Laroche, MAKEUP STUDIO, Limex, and G&G brands. Further, the company engages in the haircut service business under the Easy Cut brand. It distributes its products through department stores, beauty centers, beauty salons, and modern trades. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OCEAN.BK.summary: Ocean Commerce Public Company Limited engages in the trading of crude palm oil for biodiesel and edible oil in Thailand. The company is also involved in the trading of faucets products; and consultation and property development activities. Ocean Commerce Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OSP-R.BK.summary: Osotspa Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries manufactures and distributes energy drinks and personal care products worldwide. The company operates in three segments: Beverage, Personal Care, and Others. It offers energy drinks under the M-150, Lipovitan-D, Chalarm, Som in-Sum, White Shark, Shark Energy Drink, and M-Storm brand names; ready-to drink coffee under the M-Presso name; sport drinks under the M-Electrolyte and V+ brands; and functional drinks under the Peptein, Peptein Gold, Calpis, VPlus, C-Vitt, Calpis Lacto, and Slimma brands. The company also provides baby care products under the Babi Mild brand name; male grooming products under the Exit brand; women beauty care products under the Twelve Plus, Plantstory, and Ole Strwaberry brands; healthcare products under the KRISNAKLAN, Utaitip, Tamjai, YATHAD 4, Yixin, and BANNER brands; and confectionery products under the Botan and Ole brand names. In addition, it provides marketing and property rental services; manufactures and distributes glass, and beverage concentrates and premixes; and distributes food, beverages, and cullet products. Further, the company engages in the import, retail, and wholesale of beverages; investing in other companies; provision of research and development services; electronic commerce business; and education and sale of herbal products. Additionally, it obtains licensing fee for use of trademark, as well as provides manufacturing and distribution services. Osotspa Public Company Limited was founded in 1891 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PB-R.BK.summary: President Bakery Public Company Limited manufactures and sells bakery products in Thailand. Its bakery products include sliced and snack breads, filled flavored breads, and readymade sandwiches; burger and hot dog buns; snack cakes; confectionery products; fried products; and fast food and catering products, as well as hamburger buns. The company also provides products based on order placed by restaurants, food stores, and coffee shops. In addition, it retails its products under the Deliya by Farmhouse, Madame Marco cake, Good Morning Farmhouse, Farmhouse Moon Cake, and Farmhouse brand names; and restaurants under the Shinjuku Tonkatsu Saboten name. The company also exports bakery products. President Bakery Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. President Bakery Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai President Foods Public Company Limited.

PM.BK.summary: Premier Marketing Public Company Limited distributes consumer products in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Distribution of Consumer Products, Manufacture of Food, and Cold Storage Warehouse and Services. It distributes snack foods, confectionery, food and beverages, nutrition food and supplements, and personal care products. It also manufactures and sells fish strips and fish sheets under the Taro brand name; fried seaweed products under the Taro Biggu brand; and tuna related products, such as pouched and canned ready-to-eat tuna, and tuna pet food under the customer brand. In addition, the company manufactures ketchup and chilli sauce under the King's Kitchen brand; and frozen processed food. Further, it provides space and cold storage rental services. The company distributes its products through wholesalers and sales staff; and general retailers, including trade stores. It also exports its tuna products to Asia, Europe, and the Middle East. Premier Marketing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPPM-R.BK.summary: PP PRIME Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes feeds for aquatic animals and pets in Thailand and Japan. The company operates in three segments: Aquatic Animal Feed; Pets Food; and Production and Distribution of Electricity. It offers black tiger and other shrimp feed products; fish and frog feed products; and dog and cat food products. The company also distributes raw materials for animal feed; generates geothermal power; and offers business consulting and management services. In addition, it invests in wind power and other energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Luxe Enterprises Public Company Limited and changed its name to PP PRIME Public Company Limited in September 2018. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

PRG-R.BK.summary: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and packaging of rice and related business in Thailand, the United States, Canada, Europe, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Improving the Quality and Packaging of Milled Rice, and Food Center Business. The company offers organic, Japanese, and quinoa rice, as well as rice berry granola; maboonkrong plus, white, hom mali, and other rice products; and other products, such as NUTRA ORIS 10 capsules, as well as drinking water. It is also involved in the rental of warehouse and factory building; operation of a food center; distribution of rice; and provision of transportation service. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of MBK Public Company Limited.

RBF.BK.long_name: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited
RBF.BK.summary: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited manufactures and trades bread products, colors, fragrances, and chemicals that are used in food, beverage, consumer product industries, and hotel business in Thailand. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAPPE-R.BK.summary: Sappe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes healthy food and beverage products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers functional drinks under the Sappe Beauti Drink, Sappe Beauti Shot, and St. Anna brands; fruit-flavored vitamin water under the B'lue Water brand; fruit-flavored drinks with aloe vera flesh under the Sappe Aloe Vera Drink brand; fruit and ready-to-drink vegetable juices under the Sappe For One Day brand; juices with coconut jelly under the Mogu Mogu brand; and aromatic coconut water under the All Coco brand. It also provides ready-to-drink coffee powder under the Preaw Coffee and SlimFit Coffee; chlorophyll powder under the Preaw Chlorophyll; and dietary supplement powders under the Sappe Beauti Powder brands. In addition, the company offers jelly for health and beauty purpose under the Beauti Jelly; grilled fish snacks under the ZeaMax; shrimp snacks under the Chimdii; jelly format product for men under the Maxtive; and organic soy pudding under the DeNosh brands, as well as imports, exports, and distributes goods. The company was formerly known as Sapanan General Food Company Limited and changed its name to Sappe Public Company Limited in September 2013. Sappe Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAUCE-R.BK.summary: Thaitheparos Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sauces and condiments in Thailand and internationally. It offers seasoning food products under the Golden Mountain brand, including seasoning sauces, chilli sauces, distilled vinegar products, chilli and tomato sauces, tomato ketchups, and oyster sauces, as well as fermented soy sauces and powdering sauces, and fermented soy sauce powders; chilli sauces under the Sriraja Panich brand; and Japanese soy sauce under the Kinzan Shoyu brand. The company was formerly known as Thai Theparos Food Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thaitheparos Public Company Limited in April 2011. Thaitheparos Public Company Limited was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SCM-R.BK.summary: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. The company is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplements, cosmetics, skin care products, lifestyle products, home products, and plant supplement products. It also arranges seminars; and provides render services for staff training. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SFP.BK.long_name: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited
SFP.BK.summary: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, grows, manufactures, and distributes processed food from agricultural products. Its products include pineapples in cans; aseptic and plastic bags; pineapple juice concentrates; other fruits in can and plastic cups; and canned pineapple juices, as well as animal feeds. The company is also involved in the commercial and investment activities. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Scandinavia, Germany, the Netherlands, France, Italy, and Spain. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Food Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Plantheon Company Limited.

SISB-R.BK.summary: SISB Public Company Limited provides educational services. The company owns and manages Singapore international schools in Thailand, including four campuses that adopt Singapore and the United Kingdom curricula as the foundation for teaching and learning. Its campuses teach English, Thai, and Chinese to students. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SORKON-R.BK.long_name: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited
SORKON-R.BK.summary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Production Food from Pork, Processed Seafood, Restaurants, and Swine Farm. It offers processed seafood, such as fish balls and rolls, shrimp and squid balls, etc.; fried fish and shrimp balls, deep fried fish paste, fish tofu, fried fish rolls, etc.; spicy sauces, chilli paste, etc.; ready-to-eat products; and frozen seafoods, including squid, hard clams, shrimps, fishes, etc. under the Taechiew, Kwangchow, Kaoloon, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Taipei, Mahachai, Kaizen, and Odeng brands. The company also provides Thai native foods under the S. Khonkaen, Moo Dee, Huay Kaew, Ban Phai, Moo Champ, and sethi brands; pork and chicken snack products, which include pork crispy and caps under the EntreÃ©; frozen foods under the Yunnan brand; and papaya salad and roasted chicken under the Zaap Classic brand. In addition, it is involved in breeding and selling of finishing swine; food and beverage distribution; and restaurant and franchise businesses, as well as offers training and seminar services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 13 quick service restaurants. S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPC-R.BK.summary: Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes consumer goods in Thailand and internationally. The company distributes food and beverage, household, personal care, and baby products. It also invests in real estate; rents office buildings; and provides instant noodles, mineral water, and dairy products, as well as plastic packaging products. The company offers its products through 90,000 distribution channels. Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited was founded in 1942 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SSC-R.BK.summary: Sermsuk Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes soft drinks and beverages in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Carbonated Soft Drink and Non-Carbonated Soft Drink. The company provides drinking water, sport drinks, energy drinks, and other beverages, including tea and soda. It offers its products under the est, Crystal, Jubjai, 100 Plus, Wranger, Powerplus, v-boost, Oishi, and Rock Mountain brands. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Sermsuk Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of So Water Co., Ltd.

SSF-R.BK.summary: Surapon Foods Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and exports seafood products, and finished and semi-finished frozen foods in Thailand and internationally. The company offers various food products, including boiled shrimp, sushi shrimp, fish, squid, etc.; ready to eat products, such as dim sum, deep-fried food, and processed chicken; and Halal products comprising dim sum and deep-fried food under the Farhana brand name. It also provides sales and marketing; and cold storage warehouse and logistic services. The company was formerly known as Surapon Seafoods Public Company Limited and changed its name to Surapon Foods Public Company Limited in 1996. Surapon Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SST.BK.short_name: SUB SRI THAI PUBLIC COMPANY LIM
SST.BK.long_name: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited
SST.BK.summary: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in food and beverage, warehouse and wharf, and garment businesses in Thailand and internationally. The Food and Beverage segment produces and distributes snacks, drinks, and ice cream, as well as operates restaurants. This segment also operates as a franchise holder of Au Bon Pain, a bakery outlet; Dunkin' Donuts, a bakery shop; Baskin Robbins, an ice cream shop; M-Kitchen, a mid-size restaurant operates in a hospital premise; and Greyhound CafÃ©, a restaurant. The Warehouse and Wharf segment offers document and electronic media storage services; warehouse rental and management services; and other services, such as wharfing, weighing, stevedoring, and loading and unloading services, as well as goods deposit services. The Garment segment designs, produces, and distributes ready-made clothing and leather products. The company also engages in real estate investment trusts management activities. Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SUN-R.BK.summary: Sunsweet Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, SunSweet International Co., Ltd., manufactures and distributes agricultural products under the KC brand in Thailand. It offers fresh and processed fruits and vegetables; canned, pouch, and frozen sweet corns; white beans in tomato sauce; frozen green soybean; and other by-products, such as corn husk and maize. The company also sources and sells fresh onion, ketchup, canned pineapple, white sugar, fresh coconut, tapioca starch, jasmine rice, dressing, etc., as well as corn, soybean, and sunflower oil. It also exports its products to Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Switzerland, Germany, Lebanon, Turkey, Iran, and internationally. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

T6W.F.summary: Thai Beverage Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, and food products in Thailand, Vietnam, and internationally. The company operates through Spirits, Beer, Non-Alcoholic Beverages, and Food segments. It offers liquor, beer, malt, and yeast products; spirits, including brown spirits, white spirits, herbs, and other products; and non-alcoholic beverages comprising drinking and soda water, electrolyte beverages, energy drinks, green and herbal tea, ready-to-drink coffee, carbonated soft drinks, isotonics, soya drinks, Asian and sparkling drinks, cordials, pasteurized milk, UHT milk, sterilized milk, yoghurt, canned milk, pasteurized juice, ready-to-drink juice, ice cream, and cereal bars. The company also provides chilled and frozen, and canned food products; and fertilizers and feeds, bricks, and oak barrels. In addition, it is involved in the trading of molasses; provision of transportation and distribution, logistics, advertising and marketing, consultancy, asset and brands management, public cold storage, and human resources and organization development services; operation of Japanese restaurants, bakeries, and social enterprise; and production and distribution of biogas. Further, the company is involved in the trading of bottles and supplies; wholesale and distribution of beverages; and production of cartons, and metal and plastic packaging businesses. Additionally, it engages in asset management activities; e-commerce business; development, rental, and investment in properties; mechanical equipment manufacturing; warehousing business; trading of chemical and packaging materials; manufacture of equipment used in food manufacturing; and installation and maintenance of machinery system and equipment. Thai Beverage Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TACC-R.BK.summary: T.A.C. Consumer Public Company Limited engages in the sourcing, manufacture, and distribution of beverage and lifestyle products in Thailand and internationally. The company provides Zenya, a ready-to-drink green tea mixed with fruit juices, minerals, and vitamins; Na-Arun, a milk green tea; Sa-was-dee, a hot beverage containing Durain, a kind of fruit; and Hershey's, a chocolate milk drink. It also offers B2B Drink Dispenser, a dispenser drink; and All CafÃ©, an instant drink, as well as hot beverage vending machines. In addition, the company is involved in cafÃ© business under the CafÃ© MuanChon, Jungle CafÃ©, Arabitia CafÃ©, CP Fresh Mart, and Black Canyon names; and character business under the San-X, Dog Please, and Art Story names. Further, it licenses its products in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, and Vietnam. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TC-R.BK.summary: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the manufacturing and trading of canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand, rest of Asia, Africa, the Americas, Australia, and Europe. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TFG-R.BK.summary: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of chicken and swine products in Thailand and Vietnam. It operates through Poultry Business, Swine Business, Feed Mill Business, and Others segments. The company engages in chicken breeding, chicken meat production and sales, and sales of day-old chicks, live chickens, and processed chicken; pig breeding and sale of live pig and pork meat; manufacture and sale of feed for animals; provision of research facility services; and production and sale of animal feed sacks, plastic farming equipment, and sauce and seasoning drinks. It also offers various chicken products, such as whole chickens; chicken parts, which include wings, chests, legs, flippers, and gizzards; processed chicken; and distributes frozen and chilled chicken products. In addition, the company engages in the production and distribution of broiler chicken; research of cattle diseases; manufacture of vaccine, and sacks and plastic sacks; and provision of equipment rental services, as well as offers credits and guarantees. It serves brokers, retailers, slaughterhouses, industrial and modern trade companies, export/re-export agents, and export markets. The company also exports its products. Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFMAMA-R.BK.long_name: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited
TFMAMA-R.BK.summary: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and distribution of instant noodles, semi-instant foods, and biscuits in Thailand. The company also offers fruit juices, wheat flour, and bread and bakery products; and manufactures and distributes paper packaging products, as well as provides packaging and printing services. In addition, it is involved in the real estate investment and lending business; and restaurant and drink business, as well as trading in rice brans. The company also exports its products to rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, Canada, and the Americas. Thai President Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THYG.F.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
THYG.F.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, herring, and salmon for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab sold directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients for use in consumer goods, such as infant formula, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and clinical nutrition; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also manufactures and distributes canned tuna and seafood, pet food, frozen shrimps, animal feeds, frozen foods and aquatic animals, ingredients, canned sardines and mackerel, and smoked salmon. In addition, the company offers printing manufacturing, logistic, training and management, e-commerce, consultancy, technical, and property rental services. Further, it is involved in the packaging, tuna oil refinery, and shrimp breeding and hatchery businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TIPCO-R.BK.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, canned mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, coconut milk products, and dehydrated pineapple core and mango, as well as coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates 28 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 17 company branches and 11 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TKN-R.BK.long_name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
TKN-R.BK.summary: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks in Thailand, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders; and restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Lat Lum Kaeo, Thailand.

TMILL-R.BK.short_name: T S FLOUR MILL PUBLIC COMPANY L
TMILL-R.BK.long_name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
TMILL-R.BK.summary: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company also trades in, imports, and exports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various bakery and food products, such as bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, donut, biscuit, steamed bun, deep-fried stick dough, flat bread, biscuit sponge cake, and cake. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Inter Trade Company Limited and changed its name to T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited in 2005. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand. T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Sugar Terminal Public Co., Ltd.

TNP-R.BK.summary: Thanapiriya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates wholesale and retail superstores in Thailand. It owns 32 superstores and 2 distribution centers. Thanapiriya Public Company Limited founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Mueang Chiang Rai, Thailand.

TNR.BK.long_name: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd.
TNR.BK.summary: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes condoms and lubricating gels under the Onetouch name in Thailand. It also manufactures paper packaging products. The company sells its products through retailers and distributors. It sells its products in approximately 100 countries, including Europe, Africa, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSTE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited
TSTE-R.BK.summary: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the production and distribution of wheat flour in Thailand. The company is also involved in the provision transfer and transportation services for sugar and various agricultural products; and land rental and trading, land lots appropriation, and office and commercial units rental activities, as well as the construction of buildings on land for sale. In addition, it engages in the warehousing and loading of goods; property, silo, and warehouse rental activities; extraction of palm oil; and production of packing, polypropylene bag, plastic fiber, plastic resin, and plastic products, as well as operation of a port. The company was formerly known as The Thai Sugar Terminal Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited in 1994. Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TU.BK.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
TU.BK.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, herring, and salmon for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab sold directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients for use in consumer goods, such as infant formula, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and clinical nutrition; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also manufactures and distributes canned tuna and seafood, pet food, frozen shrimps, animal feeds, frozen foods and aquatic animals, ingredients, canned sardines and mackerel, and smoked salmon. In addition, the company offers printing manufacturing, logistic, training and management, e-commerce, consultancy, technical, and property rental services. Further, it is involved in the packaging, tuna oil refinery, and shrimp breeding and hatchery businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TVO-R.BK.long_name: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited
TVO-R.BK.summary: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soy meal and soybean oil primarily in Thailand. It provides soybean oil for household cooking purposes, as well as corn, sunflower, and canola oils under the A-NGOON brand; soybean meal for the production of animal feed under the TVO HiproÂMeal brand; and vegetable oils under the Healthy Chef and Queen brands. The company also offers olive oils under the MONINI brand; dehulled soymeal under the TVO Dehulled Soymeal brand; full fat soy under the TVO Full Fat Soy brand; dehulled full fat soy under the TVO Dehulled Full Fat Soy brand; TVO soy hull and lecithin products; TVO crude degummed soybean oil; and fish canned products. In addition, it manufactures and distributes packaging products; and distributes consumer products. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Wah Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes starch and other agricultural products in Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, and China. Its products include tapioca starch, which is used in the food industry, such as seasoning powder and sweetener products, as well as in other industries, such as paper and textile; tapioca pearl that is used in cooking savory dishes and desserts; alpha starch, which is used in the aquatic animal feed, mosquito repellent, and metal casting industries; and glucose and candy products. The company also provides vermicelli, bean vermicelli, rice vermicelli, rice flour, roselle flower, pandanus leaf, and other products. In addition, it is also involved in land holding activities; and generation and sale of electricity; and wholesale trading of tapioca starch products, rice flour products, and other starch-related products. Thai Wah Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPOIC-R.BK.long_name: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
UPOIC-R.BK.summary: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells crude palm oil and palm kernel oil in Thailand. The company operates in two segments: Oil Palm Plantation, Crude Palm Oil, and Crude Palm Kernel Oil Processing; and Generation of Electricity from Biogases and Biomasses. It also holds concessions to use forest reserve land. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited.

UVAN-R.BK.long_name: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited
UVAN-R.BK.summary: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited engages in the oil palm plantations, palm fruit processing, and oil palm seed and seedling businesses in Thailand. The company produces crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil, which are ingredients in the manufacture of cooking oils, margarines, snack foods, dairy substitutes, soaps, and cosmetics. It also operates electric power plant with methane capture biogas project. The company also exports its products. Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Krabi, Thailand.

VPO-R.BK.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

W.BK.summary: Wow Factor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells food and beverages in Thailand. It is also involved in the restaurant business. The company was formerly known as Electronics Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wow Factor Public Company Limited in May 2020. Wow Factor Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WAVE.BK.summary: Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of television programs in Thailand. It also operates an English language institution that provides English language courses and services for adult learners under the name under the Wall Street English name; and restaurants under the Jeffer Steak & Seafood name. In addition, the company is involved in the operation of concerts and events; sale of food and beverage, as well as provision of marketing activities. Further, it provides equipment for entertainment events; installs light and sound systems; prepares, installs, and removed advertising boards; advisory, research data analysis, and survey of statistic services; advertising ,event, and public relations services; and designs, produces, and distributes publishing media. The company was formerly known as CVD Entertainment Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited in April 2009. Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WINNER-R.BK.long_name: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited
WINNER-R.BK.summary: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, and distributes raw materials, ingredients, food chemicals, and consumer products in Thailand. It offers cocoa butter, liquor, and powder; couverture and compound chocolate; chocolate chips, spreads, and fillings; raisins, cranberries, cashew nuts, almonds, and rolled oats; egg white, egg yolk, and whole egg powders; popcorns, cooking papers, and pumpkin powder; margarine and shortening; seasoning products; icing, ground, and donut sugar; glazing powder, maltodextrin, dextrose, aspatame, acesulfame K, and sucralose; potato, modified, wheat, and corn starch; wheat flour and gluten; potato granules; whipping creams; and bread improvers, yeasts, and baking powders. The company also provides carboxy methyl cellulose, carrageenan, gellan gum, pectin, and xanthan gum; potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, and phosphate preservatives; powder drink; baking ingredients; and batter mix, pancake mix, and creamy custard powder. In addition, it offers frozen and chilled products, comprising of fruits and vegetables, French fries, meat and seafood, cheese, and bakery products. The company also offers consumer food products, such as microwave popcorn, granular bars, seasoned laver, pasta, olive oil, fruit jams, juices, etc., as well as semi-processed raw materials and frozen products, gourmet foods and bakeries, and beverages and drinks under the Bel Normande, Clos Pons, Campagna, Castella, EL Avion, Golden Pot, Gemez Suki, Harvey Fresh, Ital Lemon, Kimnori, Langers, Le Sang Des Seigneurs, La Espanola, Ohigya, Osterberg, Olivia, Pearl River Bridge, Pop Secret, Pons, Romulo, Reggia, Streamline, Sea Friend, Serpis, Teekane, VFOODS, and Yummyto brands. In addition, it manufactures skincare and cosmetic products, makeup, supplementary foods, and pharmaceuticals. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

XO-R.BK.summary: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades, and exports various food products in Europe, Australia, Asia, and internationally. The company's products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings, fruit juices, and canned products. It offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

Y92.SI.summary: Thai Beverage Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, and food products in Thailand, Vietnam, and internationally. The company operates through Spirits, Beer, Non-Alcoholic Beverages, and Food segments. It offers liquor, beer, malt, and yeast products; spirits, including brown spirits, white spirits, herbs, and other products; and non-alcoholic beverages comprising drinking and soda water, electrolyte beverages, energy drinks, green and herbal tea, ready-to-drink coffee, carbonated soft drinks, isotonics, soya drinks, Asian and sparkling drinks, cordials, pasteurized milk, UHT milk, sterilized milk, yoghurt, canned milk, pasteurized juice, ready-to-drink juice, ice cream, and cereal bars. The company also provides chilled and frozen, and canned food products; and fertilizers and feeds, bricks, and oak barrels. In addition, it is involved in the trading of molasses; provision of transportation and distribution, logistics, advertising and marketing, consultancy, asset and brands management, public cold storage, and human resources and organization development services; operation of Japanese restaurants, bakeries, and social enterprise; and production and distribution of biogas. Further, the company is involved in the trading of bottles and supplies; wholesale and distribution of beverages; and production of cartons, and metal and plastic packaging businesses. Additionally, it engages in asset management activities; e-commerce business; development, rental, and investment in properties; mechanical equipment manufacturing; warehousing business; trading of chemical and packaging materials; manufacture of equipment used in food manufacturing; and installation and maintenance of machinery system and equipment. Thai Beverage Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
